body_html:
fold_batch_norms/fold_old_batch_norms merges the scale part of a (fused) batch normalization into conv_op only if the bn op is trailing a conv op. Otherwise nothing is did.
And the tool run as expected in this case. You can check its implementation.

body:
fold_batch_norms/fold_old_batch_norms merges the scale part of a (fused) batch normalization into conv_op only if the bn op is trailing a conv op. Otherwise nothing is did.
And the tool run as expected in this case. You can check its implementation.
